mapper.sql: id, money, hh_user_id, withdraw_account, withdraw_account_type, withdraw_account_name, is_hande, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT ud.*,u.id as userid, u.phone as u_phone,u.username,u.real_name,u.nickname,u.email,u.honer_score,u.grade_total,u.grade_times,u.photo FROM happy_help.hh_user_withdraw ud left join happy_help.hh_user u on ud.hh_user_id = u.id order by create_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into hh_user_withdraw (id, money, hh_user_id, withdraw_account, withdraw_account_type, withdraw_account_name, is_hande, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHande,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update hh_user_withdraw
money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hh_user_id = #{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
withdraw_account = #{withdrawAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
withdraw_account_type = #{withdrawAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
withdraw_account_name = #{withdrawAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_hande = #{isHande,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hh_user_withdraw set money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hh_user_id = #{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdraw_account = #{withdrawAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_account_type = #{withdrawAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_account_name = #{withdrawAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_hande = #{isHande,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
